channel.title: Joggler on Dash
channel.description: Recent content in Joggler on Dash

item.title: Turn Joggler into a real Digital Picture Frame
item.description: In fact Joggler initially is released as a digital picture frame, but I turned it into a linux server. Now It’s time to turn this server back. Change RunLevel Edit the gdm.conf file: # cat /etc/init/gdm.conf # gdm - GNOME Display Manager # # The display manager service manages the X servers running on the # system, providing login and auto-login services description "GNOME Display Manager" author "William Jon McCann <mccann@jhu.

item.title: Solution On Joggler
item.description: ###Hardware Joggler Intel® Atom™ CPU Z520 @ 1.33GHz Dual Core MemTotal: 504480 kB Harddisk: 500G External USB. ###System and Software Download the Ubuntu Base/Server 12.04 LTS (Precise) (Joggler Image v1.4 - 09/04/2013) from the http://joggler.exotica.org.uk/ubuntu/ From the ubuntu website we know 12.04 LTS will supported to 2017, I think that fits my needs. Unzip the download image: gunzip ubuntu_base_12.04-v1.4-ext4.img.gz dd if=./ubuntu_base_12.04-v1.4-ext4.img of=/dev/sdc bs=1M The use this external usb disk for booting up the joggler.
